actions.description: The stalker makes two slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

languages: Auran  Understands Common but doesn't speak it
name: Invisible Stalker

traits.description: The stalker is given a quarry by its summoner. The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The stalker also knows the location of its summoner.
traits.name: Faultless Tracker
